dmca.title: [ABUSE] Cease and desist copyright infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 04, 2006 9:00 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: The Planet Policy Enforcement
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease and desist copyright infringement


For your review.

Martin Gaston
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Begin forwarded message:

> From: "Tina Clarke" <tinaclarke@accessfp.net>
> Date: January 3, 2006 10:59:18 PM CST
> To: <sales@cougarmtnsupport.com>
> Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
> Subject: [ABUSE] Cease and desist copyright infringement
> X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
> X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
>
> Dear Sir
>
> I am writing to inform you that unless you immediately remove my 
> copyright protected material on this page
>
> http://internettothemax.com/TRAF/Traffic-Optimizing%20FrontPage%
> 20for%20the%20Search%20Engines.htm
>
> and any other material from the site you took it from or from my 
> sites. I will contact your host, isp and Google and inform them of 
> your theft.
>
> See this link for google DMCA. http://www.google.com/dmca.html See 
> this link for original material.
> http://personal-computer-tutor.com/abc2/v16/tina16.htm
>
> I will contact my attorney to begin legal proceedings if not removed 
> immediately.
>
>
> Tina Clarke
>
>
>
